title: Answer My Question About Yordles Riot or Riot
body:
**Average height: What is it?**

Last time I checked it was 80cm, but that was before the whole lore rebuild.

replies.body:
By my measure, the average height of our current roster of Yordle champions is 84.7cm, or 2ft 9in.

No, I probably won't be able to answer any more height questions, before anyone asks!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7VbaRfcM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-01T19:33:45.680+0000)No, I probably won't be able to answer any more height questions, before anyone asks!

Although you've already accidentally told us Mordekaiser's minimum height. As four Yordles in a suit or armor (one per leg, one in the torso, one in the head), he's at least 8'4".

New?

Ability ranges have been measured in Teemos since forever.
Hum. One per leg means he is only 3 Yordles *high*.

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBurs7,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7VbaRfcM,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2018-11-01T21:31:19.525+0000)
>
> Hum. One per leg means he is only 3 Yordles *high*.

I accounted for that!

Dang, I was too tired to even do a simple multiplication properly x)

Sorry.
Nice. I remember in the old lore saying Mordekaiser stood at "around eight feet tall". So he's roughly the same size in the new canon, which is cool/terrifying.
It would be funny though. Veigar being short amongst short people.

No need to be short about it.

Sorry, had to take the pun shot.

Is that the measure because of the glamour?

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7VbaRfcM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-01T19:42:47.690+0000)

> 
> Sorry, had to take the pun shot.
>

Aw I thought you might be referencing Veigar.  I had so much fun with his glamoured height in his color story :D

But no - the average height listed does not take perceived glamour into account.
What would happen if a regular human tried to touch the shoulder of a perceived glamour? Would they feel the air or do glamours fool all senses?
